title: Constructors
subject: C++ Programming
theory:
Special method called when object is created. 
Same name as class. No return type. 
Used to initialize data members.

common_mistakes.correction: You don't call `p.Point()`. It's automatic. You call it when creating object `Point p(1,2)`.

interview_questions.question: What is Copy Constructor?
interview_questions.answer: Creates new object from existing one. `ClassName(const ClassName &other)`.
